name: Devious
description: A real time first person dungeon crawler mixed with optional story-telling visual novel segments, taking place in a fragmented world on the verge of war. As countries clash and tensions rise, the traditions of the old world find themselves fighting with the ever changing culture of the new era.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP+ Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: At least 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
